    Class and Description
    Automaton
    Represents the structure of an automaton.
    Controller
    Represents the controller component of GOAL's single-agent model checker, which uses LTL2AUT as LTL translation algorithm, and Tauriainen's generalized NDFS algorithm for on-the-fly exploration of the state space.

    Represents a state of an automaton as represented by Automaton.
